body: The review of fundamental physical properties leads into discussions of various techniques, including imaging, spectroscopy, radiometry, and active sensing.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330 or METEO436)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: METEO 477)
contentHtml: The review of fundamental physical properties leads into discussions of various techniques, including imaging, spectroscopy, radiometry, and active sensing.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330 or METEO436)(Additional Attributes: Cross-listed with: METEO 477)
title: EE 477: Fundamentals of Remote Sensing Systems
